languages.text: "Если кто-то из моих губернаторов задолжал десятину, я просто прикажу вздернуть его и все вернуть".
"If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."
languages.original_text: "Если кто-то из моих губернаторов задолжал десятину, я просто прикажу вздернуть его и все вернуть".

traits.locale_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."
"If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."
"If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."
"If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."
"If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."
"If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

languages.text: « Si l'un de mes gouverneurs ne s'est pas acquitté de ses obligations fiscales, je le ferai pendre avant de solder sa dette. »
languages.original_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'un de mes gouverneurs ne s'est pas acquitté de ses obligations fiscales, je le ferai pendre avant de solder sa dette. »

languages.text: «Si uno de mis gobernadores no ha pagado el diezmo, solo es cuestión de colgarlo y recolectar la deuda».
languages.original_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

traits.locale_text: «Si uno de mis gobernadores no ha pagado el diezmo, solo es cuestión de colgarlo y recolectar la deuda».

languages.text: “如果我的总督胆敢拖欠帝国什一税，我一定会把这个人绞死，把拖欠的税款全额补上。”
languages.original_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

traits.locale_text: “如果我的总督胆敢拖欠帝国什一税，我一定会把这个人绞死，把拖欠的税款全额补上。”

languages.text: "Sollte einer meiner Gouverneure einen Zehnt nicht rechtzeitig abgeführt haben, werde ich ihn hängen lassen und seine Schulden eintreiben."
languages.original_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte einer meiner Gouverneure einen Zehnt nicht rechtzeitig abgeführt haben, werde ich ihn hängen lassen und seine Schulden eintreiben."

languages.text: 「もし、総督の一人が租税の支払いを見落としているなら、{mf|俺|私}はそいつらを吊るして、負債を集めるだけだ」
languages.original_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

traits.locale_text: 「もし、総督の一人が租税の支払いを見落としているなら、{mf|俺|私}はそいつらを吊るして、負債を集めるだけだ」

languages.text: "Valilerimden biri aşarını ödemediyse onu astırır ve borcunu tahsil ederim."
languages.original_text: "If one of my governors has missed a tithe payment, I will simply have them hanged and the debt collected."

traits.locale_text: "Valilerimden biri aşarını ödemediyse onu astırır ve borcunu tahsil ederim."
